attributes.action: ensure that the Office for National Statistics does not close the Family Records Centre earlier than originally stated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ONS has just announced that the public search room at Myddleton Street is to close 5 months early. This will be a great loss to those researching their Family Histories, one of the fastest growing pastimes today.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that the Office for National Statistics does not close the Family Records Centre earlier than originally stated."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14676.asp

Prime Minister's Office
